issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Physical Optimizer
components.description: Optimizations which are dependent on runtime

fields.description:
Stats of non native tables are inaccurate, thus queries over non native tables can not optimized by stats optimizer.
Take example of query 
{code}
Explain select count(*) from (select `__time` from druid_test_table limit 1) as src ;
{code} 

the plan will be reduced to 
{code}
POSTHOOK: query: explain extended select count(*) from (select `__time` from druid_test_table limit 1) as src
POSTHOOK: type: QUERY
STAGE DEPENDENCIES:
  Stage-0 is a root stage
STAGE PLANS:
  Stage: Stage-0
    Fetch Operator
      limit: 1
      Processor Tree:
        ListSink
{code}
fields.summary: Hive stats optimizer wrongly uses stats against non native tables
